titleStmt.title: The speech of John Earl of Tullibardine His Majesties High Commissioner to the Parliament of Scotland, on Tuesday the eight [sic] of September, 1696.
titleStmt.author: Atholl, John Murray, Duke of, 1660-1724.
Marchmont, Patrick Hume, Earl of, 1641-1724.
Scotland. Parliament. Proceedings. 1696-09-08.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3: 'The speech of Patrick Lord Polwarth, Lord High-Chancellor of Scotland. At the opening of the sixth session of the Parliament of Scotland. On Tuesday the eighth of September, 1696'.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
